name: How They Got Away With Murder
name_original: How They Got Away With Murder
description:
You are tasked with covering up murders by disposing of the victim's body and removing all of the evidence. The organization you work for pays well, but has a reputation for making people “disappear”. A lot. You are the unseen gear that cleans up the messes so no-one ever finds out how the assassinations went down, but be careful not to make any mistakes. You have a limited time to clean up after the killer before the police arrive.

Make sure that your evidence is fully disposed of (indicated by the number in the top middle of the screen) before heading towards the green exit point. 

Use the arrow keys to move, 'x' to pick up and drop items, and 'z' to use them.

Completed for the Game Design and Development Decal final project at UC Berkeley by Chris Lu , Evan Hightower, Anthony Ling, and Khadijah Flowers
